replies.body: Is it possible to buy 7 tickets at once, because we are with 7 people that want to sit together.
Same here...
this is exactly what me and my friends want, we are also with a group of seven people.
Unfortunately, the ticket amounts are set by the venue. 6 is the maximum that can be purchased together.
Read the FAQ's
Is it possible every Tickets Are already gone?
The site crashed as I was trying to checkout and by the time I refreshed all tickets were gone...  Any ideas on how I can secure some tickets still? ;___;
Same here, the whole system bugged out when trying to select seats
*^^*%^&*(&%^&*$%^& what a crap. Are there new batch of tickets coming online?
Same here, wtf.....
Ticketmaster.be is not working at the moment... what's the problem?
"tickets do not go on sale until july 22"

Maybe I wanna check the site out, register before, probably see the seats to decide which to choose?
But no info on the site, even if it's works.
Tickets will go on sale July 22 at 8:00am PDT / 5:00pm CEST
This "ticketmaster" site is so sad. It's crashing once or twice a day... Can't believe Riot chose this site for their tickets. Can't order any tickets since site is down. GG.
What does it mean with "non-exchangable"?
i guess that you cant give your ticket to your friend, but theyre bound to you name

EDITED: It means that you can't buy for Saturday then, try to exchange for Sunday. You can still buy 6 tickets and give them 5 of them to your friends but the order will be under your name for purposes of pick-up and billing. Hope that makes more sense!
Correct me if I'm wrong, but if your ticket(s) is/are bound to your name how do you expect us to buy tickets together so we can sit together? I don't really get that part.
Hey ZyonOG! Sorry for any confusion, I misread your original message and updated my response above to make it more clear. If you have any questions, let me know.
Sooooo are tickets resellable?
thanks for the good game thresh
Is there an minimum age to go?

One of my friends is visually handicapped (10% vision) and it will  only be worth for her to go if a front seat can be guaranteed. Is there anyway that is possible? We'd love to go, cosplayed and all, but that part is kind of a deal maker/breaker.
Ticketmaster is down for a long time now. Is anybody else having this problem? I'm afraid I won't be able to purchase the tickets...
So when is worlds ???

Worlds take place in October. Here's a breakdown of our 2015 Worlds schedule:

> Group Stages: October 1-4 and October 8-11 - Le Dock Pullman, Paris

> Quarterfinals: October 15-18 - SSE Arena Wembley, London

> Semifinals: October 24-25 - Brussels Expo, Brussels

> Finals: October 31 - Mercedes-Benz Arena (formerly O2 World - Berlin)

Source: [2015 World Championship venues](http://na.lolesports.com/articles/2015-world-championship-venues)
I assume oct 24 and Oct 25 with what the faq says...
That's for the semi finals the whole event will be like a week but yeah its around the 24th and 25th of October.
Ticketmaster.be is again unavailable. How you can make safe the sales of the tickets?
The site, more than an hour later, is still unavailable.

Hey DWNCload! For everything you need to know about tickets, we got you covered on [Lolesports](http://na.lolesports.com/articles/2015-worlds-semifinals-tickets). The Semis event site won't go live until closer to tickets going on sale tomorrow but if you can't access Ticketmaster - Belgium at all, reach out to them directly at their Customer Service number +32 (0)70 222 107 (0.30€/min) or send them an email at help@ticketmaster.be
